node.display_long_description:
Must-have bow & arrow action game with state of the art Quest graphics. 

NEW GAME MODE “SIEGE OF HEAVEN” AND QUEST 2 UPGRADES!!!

Battle through the floating castles of medieval fantasy to restore Harmony in Heaven, Purgatory & Hell. Rain down arrows against forsaken souls and angelic creatures that have taken over the afterlife.

Finally a great Roguelite on Quest, excellent great replay value that adapts to the player’s skill level and progress as they play. Three beautiful and mysterious, procedurally generated worlds, with infinite replayability, three epic boss fights, multiple optional areas with great loot.

NEW! Free DLC with gate-defense game mode “Siege of Heaven” with 3 extra maps, 50+ new achievements, and leaderboards - perfect for new players and casual VR enthusiasts and advanced players alike, enjoy VR’s highest-rated bow & arrow mechanics shooting a safe spot in a beautiful environment.

Uses VR to the max and makes the most of Quest & Quest 2.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Hello archers! 

Season 3 is in full swing and to make it even more fun it’s time for a new competition.
We’re excited to announce that the “15 Minutes of Fame” Tournament has begun. 
For 6 days, starting May 14th, you’ll have the opportunity to show off your skills and prove how many points you can get in 15 minutes. 

There are four teams competing for the highest score. We've teamed up with fantastic VR content creators whom you can watch and follow on Youtube - Beardo Benjo, Matteo311, Soul Fox Gaming and SteveKnows.

You can decide which team to support before each run - simply stand on the appropriate colored beacon to support the team of your choice, or stand on the gray beacon in the middle to play without supporting anyone.

There are many prizes waiting for you, including 4 TactSuits - the amazing, wireless haptic vests from our sponsor bHaptics.

The tournament will be on until 8AM PDT/5 PM CEST May 20th

Head to Sanctuary for more information about the tournament and check out our social media channels for updates! 

discord.gg/aRzNR7XVKv
facebook.com/SuperbrightVR
twitter.com/SuperbrightVR

Fixes in version 1.3.12

- Fixed a typo in “They will be tormented” achievement
- Fixed an issue with score and damage calculation on point-blank headshots 
- There’s now a correct amount of bolts shown when using Cataclysm V and crossbow
- Fixed misplaced pickups sometimes possible to find deep in lava before engaging Asmodeus
- It should now be easier to draw an arrow while pressing trigger and reaching for the string at the same time

nodes.title: We’re ending Season 2 early, Season 3 will start on April 21st.
nodes.body_text:
Our fantastic community helped us spot some issues in high-level play scoring that we felt needed addressing. We wouldn’t want these issues to affect how the game’s played, so we’re ending Season 2 much sooner than originally planned. Season 3 will start soon with proper adjustments.

On April 21st:
- All players will earn experience and ranks for their placement on the leaderboard
- Season 3 will begin with NEW LEADERBOARDS
- Player progress % will be retained between seasons
- Ranks from previous seasons will be rewarded with weapon skins
- High level scoring system will be fixed and rebalanced
  
The time is coming for your final runs and high scores. Now is a good moment to ensure your experience, rewards, and fame!

Stay tuned!

nodes.title: In Death: Unchained now supports bHaptics TactSuit
nodes.body_text:
Hey everyone!

We’re excited to let you know about collaboration between us and bHaptics. We hope that through their technology our game will allow you to not only see the afterlife experience but to feel it on your own skin.

VR technology is still new and developing and we think that it is accessories such as haptic suits that set its milestones. bHaptics created a TactSuit - wireless haptic vest that packs multiple individually controllable vibro-tactile motors with positional haptic feedback delivered to every corner of your body. Thanks to bHaptics this kind of technology is no longer reserved for sci-fi movies, but is now available to a wider group of users.

For an adrenaline pumping VR game like In Death: Unchained where you can get shot, thrown at with an axe, fireballed and more, support for this type of technology is a natural next step. A high-quality haptic suit shall provide an immersive, extremely real even though still virtual experience.


Let us know if you like it!

node.reviewDescription:
I own a high end gaming PC and own every major VR release on both Steam and Occulus, and THIS game is holding my attention longer than anything else.

Don’t get me wrong, Half Life: Alex, Boneworks, Pavlov etc are all incredible experiences, but the fact that this humble little archery game is competing with the big dogs speaks for itself.

I have more hours on this game than I do any other VR game that I own. I also own 4 different archery games and this one is by far my favorite.
